ComicInfo.Summary:
Valeros, Kyra, Merisiel, and a team of unlikely allies face off against the demonic Castellan of Hollow Mountain! With Ezren and Seoni seemingly killed, how will the remaining Pathfinders survive the deadly traps of the Runelordsâ€™ most treacherous dungeon? Shadows, sinspawn, and more threaten our heroes in a tale written by Pathfinder publisher Erik Mona (Pathfinder Origins) and with art from rising star Sean Izaakse! Contains pull-out poster map and official Pathfinder RPG bonus encounter!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A/Reg | Regular Cover | James Boyle | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Carlos Gomez & Mohan | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Jeremy Saliba | 3 | D/LE | Ultra-Limited Edition Variant Cover | Sebastian Cichon | 4 | E/RE | Paizo.com Exclusive Variant Cover | Sean Izaakse & Mohan | 5 | *Notes:* The Ultra-Limited Edition Variant Cover is a homage to the cover of Adventure Comics #247.
